ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: We thank V. Noguerales and O. Razgour, whose valuable comments helped improve the manuscript. We thank R.J. Dyer, R.E. Symula, and E.W. Collier for their assistance with field work, and B.C. Collins for his contribution to lab work. Sequencing was performed at Yale University's DNA Analysis Facility on Science Hill. Scientific collecting permits were provided by the Alabama Department of Conservation and Natural Resources, Georgia Department of Natural Resources (permit number 29‐WBH‐12‐16), United States Department of Agriculture Forest Service, and United States National Park Service (permit numbers GRSM‐2012‐SCI‐2242, SHEN‐2012‐SCI‐0015, and CUGA‐2012‐SCI‐0008).
